title: Mississippi National River & Recreation Area: Mailing List
body: Journey to the Falls: Mailing List       Flyers announcing spring opportunities are sent out after Labor Day with restervations on a first-come-first-served basis. Flyers announcing fall opportunities are sent out in the spring. Contact Brian Goodspeed to be placed on the mailing list. Mississippi National River and Recreation Area Brian Goodspeed Suite 105 111 Kellogg Blvd. East St. Paul, MN 55101-1256 Fax: 651-290-3214
